content.rendered:
After graduating in 2010 from Queen Mary Charitha joined Regent Group working at Regent Learning Centre, managing the tuition lessons at our Edgware site. He had the responsibilities of recruiting students as well as running the day to day activities of the centre and management of staff. In addition he also tutored science lessons and has built up a vast knowledge and experience of the UK’s current education system. Furthermore, he has also been an Examinations Officer and has worked closely with the leading GCSE and A-Level exams boards including Edexcel, AQA and OCR.

Charitha is currently an ARWA Officer working in recruitment and admissions of students for our under graduate and post graduate courses. One of his key goals has always been to ensure to provide good customer care as well as ensuring the company’s goals are successfully met.
